headline: Analyst Says Microsoft (MSFT) ‘Last of’ Undervalued AI Stocks
summary: We recently published Top 10 Trending Stocks Everyone’s Watching in Q4. Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) is one of the trending stocks everyone’s watching. Morningstar’s Dave Sekera said in a recent program on Schwab Network that Microsoft is the last undervalued big tech name. “A number of them are starting to get back into overvalued territory, you know, once […]
